title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 300.4 - Hearings before workers' compensation law judges
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 300.4 - Hearings before workers' compensation law judges

State Regulations

Hearings on claims for compensation and for the designation
of a person legally responsible for a minor claimant shall be held before a

Workers' Compensation Law judge, except as herein otherwise
provided. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
300.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
